title: Map Sampler, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, paint, silk foundation
Technique: satin, split, and stem stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Globe showing North and South America with figures representing colonists and a Native American Indian. Surrounded by flowering sprays tied with tasseled ribbon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Map Sampler, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: silk embroidery, paint, silk foundation
Technique: satin, split, and stem stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-224.
